Architecture

==========
Real-Time Ousia (would) contain these components:

(+) User interface (+) Shell (+) Kernel (+) Scheduler (+) Interrupt Handler (+) Memory Management/Protection (+) Multitasking (-) File System

(-) Virtual File System
(+) Device Driver
(-) Multi Platform Porting
(-) Communication
(-) IP Stack
(-) Security

(-) Automation Test Suite

  • Build System
    (+) Documentation System

Ps: (*) Has been implemented.
(-) Hasn’t been implemented yet.
(+) Under developing.

==========

Layer 3
+—————————————————-
| application |
+—————————————————-

Layer 2
syscall ____direct_call_____
-———— -————————-
| | | framework |
| core | -————————-
| | _____direct_call____
+ ~ ~ ~ + -————————-
| port | | driver |
-———— -————————-

Layer 1
-———————————————+
| platform (hal) |
-———————————————+

Layer 0
-———————————————-
| hardware |
-———————————————-

Layer 3: application
Layer 2: os core routines, frameworks and drivers
Layer 1: hardware abstraction layer
Layer 0: specific board
